World.name: Xenon Prime
World.description: A dark and foreboding planet where hostile alien life forms lurk in every shadow, and survival means constantly outsmarting the relentless threats. The remnants of humanity cling to an ancient, decaying outpost, led by a fierce and cunning survivor, Ripley. Here, they must navigate treacherous terrain and forge uncertain alliances to fend off the alien menace.
key_challenges: Evade and outmaneuver the alien predators stalking the outpost.
Discover and utilize alien technology to enhance defenses.
Negotiate with rogue factions of humans who have turned to piracy for survival.
